definition: (of a pair of horses) to pull side by side/to be side by side/to be fused together/parallel (literary style)

sentences.english: The parallel style official documents is a kind of unique style in the fields of the official document writing.
sentences.chinese: 駢體公文是中國古代公文寫作領域特有的一種文體。

sentences.english: It is the concrete application of the parallel style in the official document writing.
sentences.chinese: 它是駢體在公文寫作領域中的具體運用。
